com.teama.pds
Class Time

java.lang.Object
  com.teama.pds.Time

public class Time
extends java.lang.Object

Author: Grant Kurtz An Singleton Entity class that maintains the current time for the entire simulation. This class can always be relied upon to return the most accurate time. All values given to or returned are treated as seconds.

addSeconds

public void addSeconds(int sec)
WARNING: This method is rather DANGEROUS to call. Using this under any situation outside of explicit unit testing may result in HIGHLY UNPREDICTABLE program behavior. This method will add an absolute value of seconds to the current time of the simulation.

Parameters:
sec - The number of seconds to add to the current time.
